00020 void CFinale::showEndingText()
00021 {
00022  if(!mp_TextViewer)
00023  {
00024   std::string text;
00025   initEpilogue(text);
00026   mp_TextViewer = new CTextViewer(g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, 0, 0, 320, 120);
00027   mp_TextViewer->loadText(text);
00028  }
00029 
00030  mp_TextViewer->process();
00031 
00032  if(mp_TextViewer->hasClosed())
00033  {
00034   delete mp_TextViewer;
00035   mp_TextViewer = NULL;
00036   m_step++;
00037  }
00038 }
00039 
00040 void CFinale::initEpilogue(std::string &text)
00041 {
00042     std::ifstream endfile;
00043 
00044     std::string filename =  m_Map.m_gamepath + "endtext.ck" + itoa(m_Episode);
00045 
00046     OpenGameFileR(endfile, filename);
00047     if (endfile.is_open())
00048     {
00049         while(!endfile.eof())
00050         {
00051          text.push_back(endfile.get());
00052         }
00053         endfile.close();
00054         text.push_back('\0');
00055     }
00056     else
00057     {
00058      g_pLogFile->textOut("Error reading \"" + filename + "\". Check if this file is in your directory!");
00059     }
00060 
00061 }
00062 
00063 CFinale::~CFinale() {
00064  if(mp_TextViewer) delete mp_TextViewer;
00065 }
